HDG.IM.content: [doesn’t respond to Nietzsche, just props hermeneutics of historicity btwn question & its answer]
HDG.IM.linkedContent: [doesn’t respond to Nietzsche, just props hermeneutics of historicity btwn question & its answer]

HDG.OHF.content: having been addressed as man, the beings-which-are-there (Daisenende) are placed in definite categorial stamps, e.g. “animal rationale” prescribes (verschreibt) definite position for looking (bestimmten Blickstellung) [oblivion of historicity]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: having been addressed as man, the beings-which-are-there (Daisenende) are placed in definite categorial stamps, e.g. “animal rationale” prescribes (verschreibt) definite position for looking (bestimmten Blickstellung) [oblivion of historicity]

HDG.OHF.content: Besorgenswege [ways of care]: the beings-which-are-there don’t stand w/in definiteness of definitions, but w/in everydayness & its historicity (Geschichtlichkeit); the there in advance (vorhandene Da) brings the appearance (Vorschein) of “others” into its Dasein > what one-self pursues, that wherein one tarries for a while, one-self (man-selbst) “is” this world: everydayness of Dasein has its Dasein there for itself, seeking it by heeding what others say about it: possibilities of familiarity (of everyday) are factically historical [Mitsein]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
